about_the_game:
Havenhold is a multiplayer sandbox action game inspired by the ancient Far East. Train as a warrior monk, wield primordial powers, craft and trade with friends, and compete against rivals in riveting battles for access to the sacred peak.

Engage in dynamic melee combat, where skill meets strategy. Master attacks with left and right stances, and unleash heavy attacks. Combine it with unique abilities of each primordial, and execute deadly combos.

Defend yourself with precise blocks, and counter with well-timed parries to regain initiative in an engagement. Experience freedom of movement with double jumps, agile rolls, and graceful air walks, allowing you to outmaneuver and overwhelm your foes.

Uncover and wield the powers of ancient primordials, each with their own unique set of abilities. Unlock and level-up these different abilities to customize and evolve your play style. Switch between your available primordials at any time to face challenges ahead.

From resources, to consumables, to crafted gear, and cosmetics, trade with other players and accumulate wealth. The world of Havenhold is built upon a player economy where everything has a value.

Claiming that seasonal victory requires coordination and teamwork. Team up with friends and clan mates to tackle co-op PvE dungeons. In PvP, combine tactics and synergy to dominate rivals and secure your place at the peak. 

Whether you’re engaged in small skirmishes or larger PvP battles the stakes are high, and the competition is fierce. Work with your allies, compete for access to the sacred peak -- and claim your place at the end of each season.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 @ 3.1 GHz or AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD R9 270 (2GB VRA with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660 Super or Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended
